commit.message:
Merge pull request #2643 from phansch/split_up_match_bool_ui_tests

Split up match_bool UI tests

verification.payload:
tree 9faad55df5a0360e223ec897aa111dac723a861e
parent fbb5050d820e2f8109e0d15bc27d5069374e356b
parent 5abe34832d80feca118b09aac3077200c3092763
author Oliver Schneider <oli-obk@users.noreply.github.com> 1523090440 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1523090440 +0200

Merge pull request #2643 from phansch/split_up_match_bool_ui_tests

Split up match_bool UI tests
